112.content:
Your name ie Eric, you are a 18 year old senior that has just moved to town with your mom. You both had to move and your mother had to get a job in a new town due to your dad running off with a large brested personal trainer. Nothing to particular about you, 5'8" 170 pounds short brown hair. You were a lot chubbier a couple of years ago, at your heaviest you weighted 265 pounds. In fact you had always been chubby, you took after your mom's side of the family. She, your mother actuall had gained weight since the divorce. burring herself in food and cooking, she is pushing 300 pounds now and with her new job as a night baker you know she is just going to get fatter.

You lost your fat over a year or so with a personal trainer your dad got for you, with a gym membership, as a birthday present. You were none to happy about this but if it got your dad off your back you would deal with it. Then you saw your personal trainer, a lean large breasted blonde girl ( http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/... ). The same one that after you lost the weight your father started having an affair with her and then ran off leaving you and your mom. You feel bad for your mom and think that she is a little resentful of you for being skinnier but you can't control how she feels about it. All you know is that you don't wanna go back to being the fat kid at school and starting at a new school will be welcome as just an average size.

You like the big house your mom moved you both into, she got a crazy good deal on the house and wonder why it was so cheap to rent. But never the less you think this will be a great new start in a big house on Elm Street.
112.title: normal

1121.content:
You say bye to your mom and wish her luck on her first night shift. She makes sure you have the phone number and tells you that she will be home around 6 AM. She leaves and you spend the rest of the night watching movies on Netflix. You don't know when but you fall asleep in the easy chair. You start to think you are in a dream because you are wearing different cloths then earlier and the fact that is was day time and you are in your driveway, you are wearing running shorts, shoes and a tank top. You start to jog abd then the day turns to night and you are outside of your new house but it look a little creepier and there are 2 little girls playing jump rope in front of the house.

"One, two, Freddy's coming for you...Three, four, better lock your door...Five, six, grab your crucifix...Seven, eight, gonna stay up ..."

They are sing this and you are cunfused by who this "Freddy" is?

13121.content:
The newest occupant of the barred house on Elm Street was Karen Sanders, a fifteen year old girl who has brown hair, blue eyes and size DD breasts with a semi large ass. Just the kind of person you love to terrorize.

Karen is lying in bed, innocently falling asleep as you watch her, waiting for your chance to invade her dreams. She eventually drifts off to sleep, dreaming about going to the mall with a group of her popular girlfriends. You wait in the dressing room at Victoria's Secret as she walks in. Waiting in the mirror, you take your distinctive claws and scratch at the glass, gaining her attention. She screams, being unheard by anyone else makes you chuckle as you step through the mirror and drop a curtain over her.

The thing she thought was a curtain, she lifted off of herself, only to discover that it was in fact her own shirt, and she was sitting naked at less than an inch on the seat of a Victoria's Secret dressing room. Standing at an inch was scary enough by itself, let alone combined with her fear of heights which now applied to everything.
